description.value: The Abbot casts Guiding Bolt and then casts another spell (other than Guiding Bolt).
An Elite creature counts as two monsters of a given level. It has +2 to all saves, as well as twice as many hit points and twice as much damage as a typical monster of its level.

While worn without any other pieces of plate armor, a breastplate consists of a single piece of plate mail that covers the torso. It is usually worn with padded or leather underneath to provide padding and some protection to the parts of the body the breastplate doesn't cover.

Large shields can be made of metal or wood, and provide substantial protection to those carrying them. They typically extend to cover one flank of the creature carrying them, though they are not so large that they hinder movement. Unlike with small shields, the wielder of a large shield has little to no ability to manipulate objects with the shield hand.

You can use your Channel Divinity to heal the badly injured.

As an action, you present your holy symbol and evoke healing energy that can restore 50 hit points.

Choose any creatures within 30 feet of you, and divide those hit points among them. This feature can restore a creature to no more than half of its hit point maximum. You can't use this feature on an &reference[undead] or a &reference[construct].

activation.condition: The target cannot be &reference[undead] or a &reference[construct]

description.value:
Stretching your hand towards a fallen ally, you command your ally to return to life to aid you, if only for a moment.

1 Action - 1 Creature (30 ft.) - 4th Level -VS - Concentration (1 Minute)*

Your target must be willing to return to life, and must not have been dead for more than 1 hour.

Healing Spell

Your target is immediately returned to life with half their hit point maximum. They take their turn immediately after yours. They are in full control of their actions. If you lose concentration on this spell, or a minute passes, they return to death.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the chosen creature can remain for up to 1 hour. If you cast this spell at 8th level or higher, they can remain for 24 hours.

This spell does not restore lost limbs, and so a target's body may not be in good enough condition to be raised.
description.chat:
1 Action - 1 Creature (30 ft.) - 4th Level -VS - Concentration (1 Minute)*

Your target must be willing to return to life, and must not have been dead for more than 1 hour.

Healing Spell

Your target is immediately returned to life with half their hit point maximum. They take their turn immediately after yours. They are in full control of their actions. If you lose concentration on this spell, or a minute passes, they return to death.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the chosen creature can remain for up to 1 hour. If you cast this spell at 8th level or higher, they can remain for 24 hours.

This spell does not restore lost limbs, and so a target's body may not be in good enough condition to be raised.

description.chatFlavor: The number of hit points restored is equal to half the target's hit point maximum

description.value: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point, and the spell ends. If the spell is still in effect when the target is subjected to an effect that would kill it instantaneously without dealing damage, that effect is instead negated against the target, and the spells ends.

You command a mote of light to seek your target. Upon contact, the bolt sears flesh and causes the creature's weak spots to glitter.

Ranged Spell Attack

  • Hit: [[/damage 4d6 radiant]] damage* and the next attack roll made against this target has advantage.

*Upcasting: Increase damage by [[/damage 1d6 radiant]] for each spell level above 1st.
description.chat:
Ranged Spell Attack

  • Hit: [[/damage 4d6 radiant]] damage* and the next attack roll made against this target has advantage.

*Upcasting: Increase damage by [[/damage 1d6 radiant]] for each spell level above 1st.

description.value:
You touch a creature where they have been wounded, mentally picturing their bodies mending and asking for their recovery as they are healed of their wounds.

Healing

This spell has no effect on &reference[construct].

  • Target gains hit points equal to [[/healing 2d6 + @attributes.spellmod]]{2d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier}.*

*Upcasting: Increase healing by [[/healing 2d6]]{2d6} for each spell level above 1st.
description.chat:
Healing

This spell has no effect on &reference[construct].

  • Target gains hit points equal to [[/healing 2d6 + @attributes.spellmod]]{2d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier}.*

*Upcasting: Increase healing by [[/healing 2d6]]{2d6} for each spell level above 1st.

description.value:
You hum a soft chant that magically carries over your surroundings, emboldening your allies and allowing them to recover quickly.

Buff

  • Target has advantage on wisdom saving throws and death saving throws.

  • Target regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.
description.chat:
Buff

  • Target has advantage on wisdom saving throws and death saving throws.

  • Target regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.

description.value:
Healing Spell

This spell has no effect on &reference[construct]{constructs}.

  • Target gains hit points equal to [[/healing 4d6 + @attributes.spellmod]]{4d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier}.*

* Upcasting: Increase healing by [[/healing 2d6]]{2d6} for each spell level above 5th.

Holding out a holy or profane symbol, you call upon its power to empower your allies.

Buff

  • The targets can roll [[/r 1d4]] and add the number rolled to all attack rolls and saving throws, rolling 1d4 again for every roll.

Upcasting: Target one additional creature for each spell level above 1st.

description.value:
You touch a willing creature, calling for their affliction to be drawn out of them and cast out.

Healing

  • You end either one disease or one of the following conditions afflicting them: &reference[Blinded], &reference[Deafened], &reference[Paralyzed], or &reference[Poisoned].
